issue.title: [C++][Docs] Missing docs for ArrayData
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13513](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13513). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
No documentation is available for the ArrayData class on the docs site <https://arrow.apache.org/docs/search.html?q=arraydata>
